p: Supercritical impregnation has recently been proposed as an effective route to the introduction of volatile active compounds, such as EOs, into PLA matrices [ 248, 249, 250, 251]. For instance, it has been recently used to incorporate thymol into PLA to develop materials with a wide range of applications [ 248, 250]. Villegas et al. recently developed PLA films impregnated with cinnamaldehyde by supercritical impregnation with very effective antibacterial activity against S. aureus and E. coli bacteria [ 249].
